version_description:
Download the update and continue your thrilling adventure now!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Experience these important optimizations for yourself!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update the most addictive time management game and see what surprises are in store for you! 

TWO NEW SETTINGS WITH 32 NEW LEVELS – Treat customers to yummy treats before a film at the Cinema and please them with special delights at the French Café.
SPIN AND WIN – Visit the Casino and try your luck at winning desirable crystals and golden coins!
MORE FREE CRYSTALS – From now on, every time you get a golden or silver mastering level, you will receive free crystals as a reward!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

It’s time for a spook-tacular Halloween hunt! Hurry to download this fun update and check out the sweet treats lurking in the aisles.

TWO NEW SETTINGS WITH 32 NEW LEVELS – Offer a large variety of food options for schoolchildren at the new School Store and open a Pizzeria to deliver the best pizza in town.
“HALLOWEEN” EVENT – Collect Jack-O-Lantern Pumpkins to travel through 16 new levels on the Halloween map and get the unique Halloween Avatar, a booster pack and a unique statuette that gives one free booster per day.
KEEP UP WITH YOUR FRIENDS – Play with your pals, grow your friends list and track their progress. Have they passed you? Better catch up!
SOCIAL WISH LIST – Exchange gifts and necessary resources with your friends to move through the game faster!
TOP 1,000 PLAYERS RATINGS – Do you have what it takes to join this elite group?

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update 1.2.202
Download this haunted update and continue your addictive time management adventure!
BUG FIXES – Enjoy smoother gameplay and increased stability!

Christmas time is coming, and all the markets are full of customers looking for presents and fun. Download this festive update and plunge into the holiday hustle and bustle!

TWO NEW SETTINGS WITH 32 NEW LEVELS – New shops mean new heights! Now you can offer customers hot chocolate and pastries in the Mountains as well as fresh healthy food in the Skyscraper shop.
CHRISTMAS EVENT – Collect snowflakes to travel through 16 new levels on the Christmas map and get the cheerful Avatar, unique Christmas statuette, useful booster pack and other valuable prizes and bonuses!
MORE FRIENDS, MORE GIFTS – Add friends, send them presents and get prizes!
NOW ON IPHONE – Play anywhere, anytime, while syncing play between your iOS devices.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update 1.3.301
This important update of your addictive game features:
- A fix for the game freezing issue connected with the Hooligan customer appearance. Don't let her misbehave and scare your customers!
Hurry to download it now!

Spring always brings something new and wonderful. This time it’s a lot of gifts and surprises in the fresh update of your favorite game Supermarket Mania® Journey! 

SPRING FLOWER FESTIVAL EVENT – Collect butterflies to travel through 16 new levels on the colorful map and get the spring avatar, unique spring statuette, useful booster pack and other valuable items!
BONUS PATHS – Complete additional levels in a row to get a cart full of prizes!
GAME CENTER SUPPORT – Earn achievements and let your friends join in on the fun.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update 1.4.401
We have fixed some minor bugs. Download the update for FREE and continue your fascinating time management adventure!

Imagine a waterfall, a babbling river and a quiet forest – in other words, the perfect place to have a picnic! Hurry to download this fresh update and go camping in the mountains with your favorite game Supermarket Mania® Journey.

PICNIC EVENT – Complete 16 absorbing new levels on the picturesque map and be rewarded with a unique avatar, booster pack and special picnic statuette, which gives you one free booster per day. Hurry as this map is only available to play for a limited time.
FRIENDLY VISITS – Visit friends to earn rewards. Take a spin in the casino on your friends and help them while they are away, so that they help you in return.
SAVE YOUR GAME PROGRESS IN THE CLOUD – Log in from any device and continue playing right where you left off!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Leave a review and let us know what you think of our latest update. Your feedback helps us provide you with the best experience.

Update 1.5.501
We have fixed some bugs and made game improvements. Run a grocery store chain with Nikki and her friends in this new update of the exciting time management game!

It’s time for a spook-tacular Halloween hunt! Hurry to download this fun update and check out the sweet treats lurking in the aisles.

NEW SETTING WITH 32 NEW LEVELS – Oysters, prawns, lobsters and other seafood delights are waiting for your customers in the new Pier shop. Treat them to some hearty Clam Chowder and grilled salmon cooked by you!
HALLOWEEN EVENT – Collect Jack-O-Lantern Pumpkins to travel through 16 new levels on the Halloween map and get the unique Halloween avatar, a booster pack and a unique statuette that gives one free booster per day.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Your favorite game is only getting better. Check it out!

Try a brand new version of the game! No need to rush anymore. Play at your own pace, matching three treats in a row.
MASTER NEW GAME TECHNIQUES – Swap and match three or more identical treats, meet all targets for the given number of moves, beat levels and open new stores.
CONQUER COMPLETELY NEW LEVELS – 359 puzzling levels with unique game boards, chips and obstacles are already on the city map!
USE NEW BOOSTERS – The Brush, Firework, Magic Arrows and other boosters will help you to tear down obstacles, remove obstructing chips and bring victory closer!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

We've heard your feedback about switching the game mechanics from Time Management to Match-3 and would like to tell you about several adjustments we’ve made as a result of your valued input.

THE RETURN OF TIME MANAGEMENT MECHANICS – We’ve brought back the original Time Management mechanics in this latest update, now available on all app stores.
ALL PROGRESS SAVED AND RESTORED – Your previous Time Management progress in "Supermarket Mania Journey" will be restored, while your Match-3 progress, if any, will be saved.
GOOD NEWS FOR MATCH-3 FANS – We have released a separate game version entitled “Supermarket Mania – Match 3” that maintains any Match-3 progress you may have already made.

Thank you for your patience and communication during this process. We truly appreciate your feedback and opinions and look forward to continuing to serve your needs.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Leave a review and let us know what you think of our latest update. Your feedback helps us provide you with the best experience.
